SEARCH
Module it.am04softeng.codexnaturalis
Package Client

Class Player

java.lang.Object
Client.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the player as viewed by the client. It is different from the player on the server.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name)
      Deafult constructor
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player

    • Player

      public Player(String name, int points, int handSize, boolean active, Color color, Manuscript manuscript)
      Custom constructor. Used in saved games and when reconnecting to a game.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player
      points - the total points of the player
      handSize - the size of the hand of the player
      active - the active status of the player
      color - the color of the player
      manuscript - the manuscript of the player
